pkgmetadata.longdescription: Conceptual Properties Norming Studies as Parameter Estimation // Implementation of conceptual properties norming studies, including estimates of CPNs parameters with their corresponding variances and estimates for the sampling process. See Canessa et al. (2021) doi:10.3758/s13428-020-01439-8. "How to Carry Out Conceptual Properties Norming Studies as Parameter Estimation Studies: Lessons from Ecology".
